data.lyric:
[ti:mad woman]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:folklore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]mad woman (Explicit) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:01.02]Written by：Taylor Swift/Aaron Dessner
[00:02.04]© 2020 TASRM Publishing, administered by：Songs Of Universal, Inc. (BMI),Ingrid Stella Music, administered by SonyATV Tunes LLC (ASCAP)
[00:03.06]All Rights Reserved. Used by Permission.
[00:03.66]Produced by：Aaron Dessner
[00:04.05]Recorded by：Jonathan Low and Aaron Dessner at Long Pond (Hudson Valley, NY)
[00:05.34]Mixed by：Serban Ghenea at Mixstar Studios (Virginia Beach, VA)
[00:06.33]Engineered by：John Hanes
[00:06.73]Mastered by：Randy Merrill at Sterling Sound (New York, NY)
[00:07.71]Drum Programming, Percussion, Bass, Acoustic Guitar, Electric Guitar, Piano and Synthesizer by：Aaron Dessner (Hudson Valley, NY)
[00:09.40]Orchestration by：Bryce Dessner (Biarritz, FR)
[00:09.99]Beat Programming, Synthesizers, Hand Percussion and Drums by：James McAlister (Los Angeles, CA) recorded by James McAlister
[00:11.67]Viola and Violin by：Yuki Numata Resnick (Buffalo, NY) recorded by Kyle Resnick
[00:12.96]Cello by：Clarice Jensen (Brooklyn, NY) recorded by Clarice Jensen
[00:15.14]What did you think I'd say to that
[00:18.03]Does a scorpion sting when fighting back
[00:21.39]They strike to kill
[00:24.07]And you know I will
[00:28.44]You know I will
[00:35.32]What do you sing on your drive home
[00:38.45]Do you see my face in the neighbor's lawn
[00:41.46]Does she smile
[00:43.52]Or does she mouth f**k you forever
[00:48.83]Every time you call me crazy
[00:51.25]I get more crazy
[00:53.16]What about that
[00:56.02]And when you say I seem angry
[00:58.03]I get more angry
[01:01.07]And there's nothing like a mad woman
[01:04.47]What a shame she went mad
[01:08.26]No one likes a mad woman
[01:11.48]You made her like that
[01:14.63]And you'll poke that bear til her claws come out and you find something
[01:19.85]to wrap your noose around
[01:23.04]And there's nothing like a mad woman
[01:42.91]Now I breathe flames each time I talk
[01:46.15]My cannons all firing at your yacht
[01:49.25]They say move on
[01:51.71]But you know I won't
[01:56.28]And women like hunting witches too
[01:59.77]Doing your dirtiest work for you
[02:02.92]It's obvious that wanting me dead has really brought you two together
[02:09.87]Every time you call me crazy
[02:12.30]I get more crazy
[02:14.19]What about that
[02:17.09]And when you say I seem angry
[02:19.11]I get more angry
[02:22.24]And there's nothing like a mad woman
[02:25.58]What a shame she went mad
[02:29.39]No one likes a mad woman
[02:32.66]You made her like that
[02:35.74]And you'll poke that bear til her claws come out and you find something
[02:40.82]to wrap your noose around
[02:44.20]And there's nothing like a mad woman
[02:51.12]I'm taking my time
[02:53.04]Taking my time
[02:54.60]Cause you took everything from me
[02:58.12]Watching you climb
[02:59.79]Watching you climb
[03:01.46]Over people like me
[03:04.72]The master of spin
[03:06.15]Has a couple side flings
[03:08.14]Good wives always know
[03:11.64]She should be mad
[03:12.91]Should be scathing like me
[03:14.59]But no one likes a mad woman
[03:21.38]What a shame she went mad
[03:28.40]You made her like that

[ti:mad woman]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:folklore]
[by:]
[offset:0]

[00:15.14]你以为我会对此说些什么
[00:18.03]毒蝎反击时会伤人吗
[00:21.39]它们会毫不留情
[00:24.07]你知道 我也一样
[00:28.44]你知道 我也一样
[00:35.32]你开车回家的路上唱什么歌
[00:38.45]你会在邻居家的草坪上看到我的脸吗
[00:41.46]她会笑吗
[00:43.52]或者说她会破口大骂
[00:48.83]每当你说我疯狂时
[00:51.25]我就变本加厉地疯狂
[00:53.16]怎么样
[00:56.02]当你说我看起来很愤怒时
[00:58.03]我就变本加厉地愤怒
[01:01.07]疯女人不好惹
[01:04.47]她变成疯子 多么可惜
[01:08.26]没人喜欢疯女人
[01:11.48]是你让她变成这样的
[01:14.63]你非要把人惹得怒不可遏才罢休 最后你只能
[01:19.85]自食其果
[01:23.04]疯女人不好惹
[01:42.91]现在我怒火攻心 
[01:46.15]我将对着你开火
[01:49.25]他们说 算了吧
[01:51.71]但你知道 我不会罢休
[01:56.28]女人们可不会轻易善罢甘休
[01:59.77]会对你耍尽手段
[02:02.92]很明显 都想置我于死地 这恰好让你俩走到了一起
[02:09.87]每当你说我疯狂时
[02:12.30]我就变本加厉地疯狂
[02:14.19]怎么样
[02:17.09]当你说我看起来很愤怒时
[02:19.11]我就变本加厉地愤怒
[02:22.24]疯女人不好惹
[02:25.58]她变成疯子 多么可惜
[02:29.39]没人喜欢疯女人
[02:32.66]是你让她变成这样的
[02:35.74]你非要把人惹得怒不可遏才罢休 最后你只能
[02:40.82]自食其果
[02:44.20]疯女人不好惹
[02:51.12]我不慌不忙
[02:53.04]慢悠悠的
[02:54.60]因为你夺走了我的一切
[02:58.12]看着你一步一步往上爬
[02:59.79]看着你一步一步往上爬
[03:01.46]踩在我这样的人肩上
[03:04.72]情场老手
[03:06.15]有几场风流韵事
[03:08.14]细心的妻子总心知肚明
[03:11.64]她应该发怒
[03:12.91]应该像我一样剽悍
[03:14.59]但没人喜欢疯女人
[03:21.38]她变成疯子 多么可惜
[03:28.40]是你让她变成这样的
